plot: Fourteen-year-old Eugène has been dancing since he was six. Although he is bullied at school because of his hobby, he won't be put out of his stride. Will Eugène succeed in convincing his schoolmates that ballroom dancing isn't silly?
title: In stijl dansen
plot_es: Fourteen-year-old Eugène has been dancing since he was six. Although he is bullied at school because of his hobby, he won't be put out of his stride. Will Eugène succeed in convincing his schoolmates that ballroom dancing isn't silly?
